title: Who sings the song 'Only Wanna Be With You'? - Quora

response.answer_text: Oh, I think you are referring to one of my favorite bands, Assück. They have this one song, where after the heavily distorted guitars, the singer, Dave "Spinach" Malinksky, nearly blows out the mic, screaming “ONLY WANNA BE WITH YOU, ONLY WANNA PEE WITH YOU…” I truly can’t stop repeating this song on my bus commute from Orlando to Tampa, though I think my bus-mates are getting a little annoyed from hearing the Assück leaking through my speakers. Cheers, Rob.
Hootie & the Blowfish an American rock band, Origin: Columbia, South Carolina, United States (1986) Members: Darius Rucker, Mark Bryan, Jim Sonefeld, Dean Felber, Brantley Smith, Peter Holsapple
